content.detailedDescription:
It was winter weather. small amount of snow on the ground and cold. i was in my husbands car , passenger side with him driving.We had just left the cinema in kanawha city where we went to celebrate our wedding anniversary. i saw the object stationary beside the interstate overpass(west bound lane) in front of the charleston, wv, state capitol. one week later, again, i saw the same object stationary over the sand and stone pit beside the dunbar interstate bridge(east bound lane) about the same distance away from the interstate as the other one i saw. they were both sighted by myself only. my husband was too busy driving to get a look at them both times. it was late afternoon each time. the one next to the dunbar interstate bridge was partially surrounded by the fog caused by the snowy weather at that time. but i could still tell it was the same type of craft. the one at the state capitol was totally exposed. they both were about the size of a large bulldozer.The first thing i noticed about them was they were so close to the bridges and so beautiful. shaped exactly like a chrome shaped derby hat with christmas type lights moving gracefully along the brim- back and forth. i couldn't believe the newspapers or tv never had any reports of them. there was plenty of traffic both times. i wanted my husband to stop the car but he refused because of the traffic and weather. the crafts never seemed to move.
to this day , i still hope to see them again. i've never seen or heard of any craft of these descriptions in the news, internet, or paper. i'm very surprised. i was brought up a very religious person and you wonder about stories such as this. but i believe what i saw was real and not man made and was really beautiful.
content.summary: It was shaped like a chrome derby hat and along the so call brim was the colored lights gliding back and forth along the so call brim.

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start by saying that i am a member of the air force.  i have worked around several different types of aircraft and have seen just about every aircraft in our inventory.  

i brought my family to west virginia for the easter holiday to spend with some relatives.  on easter day we decided to travel(about 25 minutes or so) to cacapon state park at approximately 1230 hrs.  we drove all the way to the top of the mountain(which the road was constructed in 2007)to the lookout point that views the entire valley and adjacent mountain range.  i started to take photos with my camera phone(about a 3.2mp camera).  i took several photos of my oldest son and of the valley and mtns.  i took out my canon t1i dslr to take photos of the landscape and of the family.  i snapped probably around 20-30 photos.  during our visit to the state park we did not hear or notice anything in the sky.  it was a perfect day, about 65 degrees, partly cloudy.  we were on top of the mtn for approximately an hour.  once we got back to my relatives house we started to view the photos on the phone to show some family members.  i noticed something in the photo that caught my attention, an object in the sky.  i zoomed in and it is the shape of a disc-like object.  i am skeptical to begin with(i immediately thought it could be a predator drone from one of our bases not far away) so i pulled out my canon t1i to see if there were any anomalies in those photos.  not only were there anomalies, there was a similar object in several of the photos.  this object made no sound and stayed in the area for a decent amount of time as you can tell by the cloud cover that varies in several of the photos.  the reason i know it is not a drone or something that we fly is because in one photo it is in a completely vertical position(we dont just hover in the vertical position unless it is an f-22 raptor, which makes a lot of noise).  also, in several of the photos there are twin discs, one large and one small.  identical in different pictures.

i showed these to several people(air force affiliated) and they believe there is something unexplainable in these photos).  

the only reason i have contacted mufon is because this is the only organization i know of that deals with these sightings legitimately.  

i only know of "mufon" from an article i read about regarding a 1978 incident at fort dix/mcguire afb which sparked my interest because of how it is very well documented, and how credible it seems.

i hope these photos spark your interest and if you would like to contact me please do not hesitate.

i have three photos, that are very interesting and show different aspects of the craft but due to some family members being in the photos i feel it prudent to not include them.  i will send them via email if requested.  the photos show double objects, one vertical, one horizontal(in same photo).  they also show dimensions.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Took photos of family atop cacapon state park mtns with two seperate cameras, caught ufos in lense of cameras

content.detailedDescription: Was at home on the deck smoking. porch lights on. 9 pm est -/+ 1 minute. facing east and notice a faint light (i.E., very faint star) travelling a straight path from the ne sky (about 65 degrees vertical from horizon)towards the se sky. time of travel from spotting to horizon was about 40 sec. next, about half a min later, spotted orange streak with hollow black center (shaped like a streaming firework with the center/core blacked out) travel from sw towards the path the first object took in the ne. spot another faint light traveling from the se towards the ne (about 45 degrees vertical from horizon) travel time approx. 30 sec from initial observation till lost behind cloud cover in the ne sky. approx. 1 min later observed another faint light travelling from ne towards the se (approx 50 degrees vertical from horizon) travel time from initial observation in the ne to se horizon approx. 45 sec.
content.summary: 3 faint starlike objects criss crossing path n->s and s->n across eastern hemisphere.

content.detailedDescription: This thing looked like a jet contrail but it went straight up from the ground. enlarged photo, applied filters to see object, object not visible.
content.summary: Resembled rocket launch but no object visible, only contrail. straight up

content.detailedDescription: I just got of work and was heading to my car when i noticed three bright star like orbs east of the power plant. they hovered and descended and where making 90 degree direction changes for about just over 70 seconds and then they just disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 starlike orb ufo east of surry power station.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch  seen in centre and clinton counties for a year on clear nights  star like but move  .. thru binocular spin around  first sighting called state college police they said even if thats what it is we cant do nothing
content.summary: Starlike but thriugh binoculars spinning

content.detailedDescription: I was observing with naked eye for planets. night sky was clear with little overcast. having a cigarette on front steps by myself. no street noise of any kind like police or fire trucks. it was very quiet can actually hear cars a couple of blocks away. can hear the train a mile away. heard a jet minutes before sighting. then i couldnt hear a train anymore. i was standing outside kind of struck by the silence of the city. so i started looking for a planet and its position. it was in the south direction on the right lower side of the moon. looked for a few seconds and decided i didnt want to stare it was a little straining to look at from my position. so as i was gonna sit down and fininsh my smoke and think about the silence then something caught my eye...At first i thought i was gonona see a bird. no sound for the first 2 or 3 seconds and then i was adjusting my depth perception thinking it was too far to hear. then it was really high and then i noticed a round yellow orangish light  near the rear of it. i thought what is that. next 4 to 5 seconds i was judging its direction and how it was flying. it was going straight and i know a bird dosent fly that way. so i adjusted my depth perception again. it was going straight and i judged it to be like a 1000 ft in the air and it was huge...3 times the size of a helicopter...So i was concentrating real hard to hear it ... and i couldnt hear anything. so it was like a mile away and for sure over 1000 ft away...My perception started adjusting and then i can see that the moon was like 50 to 60 degrees at the time. so it was flying straight and then it swayed...With me facing directly west and it being directly over the city, i noticed it swayed a little and then straighten back to the path it seemed to be following. i concentrated really hard to see any body movement in case it was a bird. but no birds has light on it...But i still tried to see if there was any body movement, and still nothing. it was a solid object...Like it was floating. and it swayed and then went right back to the path it seemed to be on. the direction it was heading  was south. to me it went right over the airport. so for the next 10 seconds or so i was trying to hear it and look for body movement. nothing...No noise or body movement. while i was observing i was looking at the bottom of the object and it seemed to a triangular shape...The top half was hard to see...But the bottom surface seemed smooth like...And to me it seemed to be reflecting the orange light i was seeeing from the street lights which were orange. this yellow light was in the middle near the rear. no other lights and no body movements. it was moving 3 times as fast as a helicopter...It sped up a little then back to its other speed. i got off the steps and walked toward the street to see it as long as i could before i lost sight of it over the house. and then rushed back to the steps and peered between the houses. it disappeared on the right side of the moon's position. it travelled in a perfect straight path with a one more sway off the path and then back again. but very little sway. the most amazing fact of this was the size, the light near the rear, no noise at all, the speed, and the straightness of its path of travel. as i watched i wondered alot about the reflection it seemed to be giving. like the bottom was not perfectly flat but its surface was and it was smooth. but the bottom seemed to be like wings where the far side was bent down reflecting light toward me and the closer side was a little bent. i can see light at the bottom because of reflection of light but i couldnt make out the top of it...The light was near the rear and in the middle. there was no fire contrail or any sort of contrail. if it hadnt caught the corner of my eye i would not have seen it at all. it was gone like in 10 to 15 seconds. as i watched and after a couple of seconds went by i had a sudden feeling like i would never ever see anything like this again. but its vivid in my memory and i wont forget it. it was so strange to see something like it and my best conclusion is that it was object i could not identify. no noise...I cant believe how quiet it was considering how high and fast it was moving....For me an object that size had to be using a loud engine to stay afloat and move that fast...But i couldnt hear anyhthing.
content.summary: No sound for large size, about 3 times larger than helicopter, straightline path with little swaying and round yellowish light near rear and reflective orange  color from orange street lights and flat bottom with kind of triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: While driving down i35 last night, right before the rest area before exit 178, we were noticing a truck with a large trailer swerving a great deal.  immediately, to my left, i watched as a very large orb, emitting an incredibly bright white light appeared to land in an area surrounding a private subdivision on the east side of 35.  as it  landed, it seemed to become almost like plasma...Or liquid light.  we drove around looking for some sort of either a crash or other witnesses.  we found neither.
content.summary: Driving down 35 towards exit 178 heading south light land

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from dinner to a relatives apartment complex and when we saw the first one we thought maybe it was part of  the russian  craft that was scheduled to fall but then another fire ball came and three more following the same path. nothing was ever mentioned in the news and i have never been able to find any explanation. i was between buildings so i could not see them for very long. it was very strange nothing was ever mentioned.
content.summary: Saw five fireballs follow the same line spaced  about one minute apart

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from dinner to a relatives apartment complex and when we saw the first one we thought maybe it was part of  the russian  craft that was scheduled to fall but then another fire ball came and three more following the same path. nothing was ever mentioned in the news and i have never been able to find any explanation. i was between buildings so i could not see them for very long. it was very strange nothing was ever mentioned.
content.summary: Saw five fireballs follow the same line spaced  about one minute apart

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, with my wife at that time across the bridge at pence springs wv. first house on the left.Best guess is noon. watching tv. the light through the window went dim, like a cloud came over. so i got up to look outside there is a little porch with a roof so i went out into the yard and looked up there right in front of me. about 100 ft. away and comming toward me was this round silverish thing. it looked to be about 50 75 ft. in the air i ran back  opened the door and yelled to my wife to come see this. we went into the yard and just stared at it it moved slowly very slowly until it was over head. now, if you take a dinner plate and hold it at half an arms lenth over your head. thats about it i don't know the direction it came from or went because i don't know the comppase dir. for that spot i could go there and find out if your interested but it turned slowly to the right and started to cross the river it was in plain sight my wife said " it is isn't it?" i said yea, so? she said. "well it bothers me" i didn't care. it was just great to me. there was a tall tree beside the river. i said look! its going to hit the top of that tree! but it didn't that when i noticed it was higher than i thought. it moved so slowly. we got tired and sat on the steps seemed to take hours. i told her to get the camera she did but no film. we had just had a baby. so and besides we were on welfare so no money either i started to go across the river to a store to get film plus, tell somone but was afraid i would miss it, and it would be gone, when i got back. so. i looked around for a neighbor. all were at work! there was nothing i could do at all.We didn't have a phone. so we just watched it. it slowly went across the river and we would back up a step watch it move behind the trees then back up another step. until we were standind up on tippy toes. at that point. i said lets drive across the river and park and watch it come across so we jumped in the car raced across the bridge and never saw it again!!! where the hell did it go? also as we looked for it there were small jet planes comming from every direction high in the sky. i said look at all the jets!! but that wasn't the oddest thing if it was 12 i know it took only about 20 or 25 min. for this to take place when we turned around to go back, we were hit with a flood of cars. going home. we got back home and i noticed it was 530 in the evening it was quitting time!! at the time i guess we thought it took that long. but now i know there is no way it was there 5 hours!! at least i don't see how. and no cars at all came by my house for 5 hours? beats me! any way i haven't seen my ex since 87 but i know where she lives..So i guess thats it.Wish i knew the compass points. but i don't sorry.........Eli
content.summary: Round silverish smooth

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon,

i live in canada, toronto, ontario.
i had many compelling dreams, i experienced a few paranormal facts but nothing is to me so undeniable like this picture. i would like to get a conclusive answer from people like you.
it was a late evening at the beginning of the month of april, 2012, i went in my balcony and i saw the moon and two stars forming a triangle with the moon; it appeared the base of the triangle having the moon on the right side of the star, i called my husband to see the view, it looked to very romantic and i went to grab my daughter���s digital sanyo camera and i took two pictures. i am not so good with it. the sky was nice, clear, no clouds at all. the next days i looked at the moon again and appeared that the low i had many unusual dreams, i experienced paranormal facts but nothing exited me more than this.Er star on the base of the triangle moved on the right side of the moon. i was amazed and took another picture. in mean time i took some pictures of some piece of furniture in my home and happened that i need to down load the pictures and i noticed in one of the moon���s picture that there are tree objects which we did not see with naked eyes. the objects do not appear to be plains. they appear in my picture to be closer than the moon; all tree objects have the same shape, i would say it is a con shape. i would like the mufon to investigate and conclude about those objects. now i am excited, impatient and i wish to get an answer to these objects in my picture. are they really here? on the internet are so many pictures and videos but i have hard time to believe because there are many counterfeit. i will not send the picture; i would like you to get first in touch with me if you are interested to see the pictures.
content.summary: There are some cone shape objects in my picture.

content.detailedDescription: During my night time videoing looking for weard things i was able too video this very odd light coming from the south going north east as i'm video it going by. other airplanes in the area and in video with ufo?-- i been noticing that eather before and after i seen this type of ufo? i seen what mite be a jet "very high" in the sky from the arm service looking around for something..I see a patern going on each time...Very odd but makes scence over the years.
content.summary: Large brite light ufo? coming from the sw going ne -airplane near by during my night videoing again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking star trail photos. various exposure times. most of the photos were normal looking. some bumps in the trails seeing as my camera was on the ground. but in this photo it is whirling all over, and seems to be a signature of sorts.  if all the star trails did the same thing, i would debunk this as the camera was shaken... 
this is an unaltered photo.  i added another photo from the same set of shots as a guide line to what they all looked like.
content.summary: Taking photos of star trails, got a weird path obviously not a star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a retail store manager for a well-known corporation and was returning home to asheville, nc from a business trip in the greenville, sc area. it was near 9:30pm on monday, april 27th of '09. i was alone, traveling along us 25 heading toward i-26 and had crossed the state line not long before this sighting. 

i noticed the craft ahead of me; it caught my attention because of the unusual lights, how low it was and how close it was to the road. as i got closer to it, i became sure that this wasn't any type of standard aircraft i'd ever seen before. it was round/ball-shaped with two red lights on either side, center, and a row of at least 3 rectangular light panels on the bottom half which were strobing slowly in vertical sequence, from the top one down. it was about the size of the cab section of an 18-wheel truck. i estimate it was approximately 50 feet in the air, on the right side and just slightly over the road. it did not move at all, and as far as i could tell, it remained stationary the entire time i had visual contact with it. 

i had the radio playing and did not have the presence of mind to turn it off or down, so i am unaware if the craft made any type of noise. i did briefly consider stopping to try and take a picture, but the only thing i had with me was an older cell phone which previous experience taught me did not take decent pictures at night at all.

i slowed my vehicle quite a bit as i approached in order to get a better look at it, being both fascinated but understandably a little shaken, too. in my rearview mirror, i previously had noted that another car was coming up behind me. i was driving quite slowly, so with that in mind, i sped up slightly to prevent annoying the other driver and finally drove past the craft, which still never moved from its position.

once past it, i looked in my mirror again and was dismayed to see that the car i'd seen behind me was no longer there--i'm not sure if the other driver had seen what i was seeing and pulled off or had exited the road somewhere--but i became immediately aware that i was now totally alone on the road, with no cars whatsoever in sight in either direction. this finished unnerving me and while i no longer saw the craft, i suddenly felt the need to at least be within sight of other cars/people, so i accelerated to appx 70-75 mph and stayed at that speed until i finally caught up to more cars about five minutes later.
content.summary: Metal ball with flashing lights hovering next to us 25 in henderson county, nc

content.detailedDescription: Car accident on the road.I stopped to snap a picture. i came back to the house and was looking over the photo after showing it to my folks. the first shot shows nothing unusual. but then above the tree line a minute later close to the wire it caught the object. circular in shape. apon closer exam i found what looks like a grey bottom and a disturbance around the object.
content.summary: At a car accident. i snapped a photo and it showed up later when i was looking at photo.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my upper driveway.I was talking to a friend on the phone and was commenting on how bright the moon was. we had a brief interlude from clouds.  it had just become visable (on the rise). the moon was to my left. i looked at what i thought was venus or jupiter (in front of me, looking over my house) and was commenting on how freakishly bright it was and then it just dropped. i was freaking out! it stopped then shot southwest then zig zagged to a western flight path and was gone.
content.summary: Bright light drops from sky hovers for a second then slight zig zag flyaway

content.detailedDescription: I saw these two orange over reddish lights flying one behind the other heading north to south crossing jericho turnpike at about 1 mile east of route 110 on 4/7/12 at 8:45 pm, in huntington station, ny. they made no noise and i realized immediately that they were very strange. misjudging their speed i attempted to run back in my house to get my camera. when i came back out about 15 seconds later the last of the two lights had entered the low ceiling clouds to the south of me, and disappeared before i could snap a picture. they were very bright and solid with an orange light on top and a smaller red light on the bottom. i am reporting this because i  believe the there are many more people who witnessed this. they were very bright and solid with an orange light on top and a smaller red light on the bottom.
content.summary: 2 orange/red glowing lights in succession over huntington station, ny

content.detailedDescription: I was at a private lake with my friends, just hanging out when they noticed and unusually bring light a little ways off in the distance. it's lights were flickering and it seemed to hover. there was an air plane flying close by it. i don't know what it was doing. there seemed to be no hostility from either parties. then the ship headed west from the east and flew right over our heads. it was oval shaped and had a red light on the right side and a blue one on the left. it seemed to move in slight zig zags as it flew by, past our heads and out of sight. we were all very surprised. my friends asked what it was and i told them it was a ufo. it was an incredible thing to be able to see.
content.summary: It was oval shaped with a red light on one side and a blue light on the other, with white head lights.

content.detailedDescription: Just after mad tv ahd started on cartoon network, i noticed an unusual* object traversing the sky. (living near an international airport and a hospitals with helicopter landing zones, seeing aircraft is not unusual. but this was on a flightpath that didn't conform to typical ones used frequently by commmercial or emergengy medical aviation.)the path it took was strikingly smooth, steady, and, again, did not travel in a speed or manner indicative of conventional aircraft. it's size, altitude, speed were impossible to determine with my limited level of instrumentation (binoculars) at my disposal. i can only analogyze it's appearance to a soft, white led bulb glow, steady in both consistency and brightness. please note: the object crossed my line of sight from nearly horizon to horizon, over a time period of approximately two to four minutes, giving me the vantage point of viewing it from several angles, and with contrast of several visible stars, planets, and conventional aircraft. this object displayed no faa directional, formation, or static or flashing navigation lights, as is nearly always seen on typical aircraft, leading me to theorize it could possibly be the solar albedo reflecting off a man-made satellite, or asteroid. (again, lack of accurate size perspective made it nearly impossible to estimate whether it was an airborne craft, or orbiting object). using a pair of barska 10 x 42 binoculars did little to clarify any mysteries, as i found it difficult to get a precise focus on the object, leaving me uncertain if i could see a solid mass behind the illuminated area, or it was merely an optical or atmospheric anomaly. when i took my gaze off the object to focus in on nearby aircraft, stars, and planets for a control comparison, i was unable to reaquire the object, leaving me perplexed as to if it altered course, dimmed, turned off, or changed the direcion of the light, or simply passed through enough atmosphere so as to be rendered unvisible to me. i heard no sound i could attribute to the object, nor could i detect any exhaust, or any other effects on surrounding space, matter, persons, animals, etc. i was unable to find anyone else that also witnessed it to confirm, support, or add to  my report.
content.summary: Led-like soft white light or albedo on steady (orbital?) flightpath

content.detailedDescription: As always i like to watch this 'rainbow star' as it follows across the sky, tonite it was extra bright and flashy so my pics turned out really good. its really beautiful zoomed in on video.
content.summary: More rainbow star, better shots tonite

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a big spher when i was 12 years old i saw it coming down in between the trees the color was a bright redish-orange and it last it about 3 to 5 min i don't remember the exact time but it was around 8-9 pm in my dads ranch in mexico and small town called toluca,
i've been telling everybody since then but tonight i saw one of the episodes of aliens over the earth and you guys made a digital copy if what the guy was telling you guys that he saw three sphere coming down thru/down the trees but when i saw that it was the same thing that i had seen years ago and know i can say that someone has seen the same thing i had experience and that i wasn't just going crazy thanks for the opportunity to make this digital image of what i have seen...
content.summary: I saw a big spher coming down in between the trees

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside of my home, with my husband just got out of the car. had my camera with me. didn't have time to set up the camera or tripod, it was flying so fast.  held the tripod by the legs to capture it!


this does not look man made. in fact i have about a dozen videos of simliar spheres,brillant, with blue light, green and red.  the difference is that this one is static!
content.summary: large sphere/ufo flying over my home

content.detailedDescription:
I am a physician dropped off prescriptions. for a patient about 918pm were talking outside for five minutes when we noticed diamond shaped object about 10 oclock position it got brighter then
nwould vanish patient called teenage cousin out as we watched the object rotated to seemingly face us while getting larger as it seemed to slowly descend the teen ran in the house myself and my patient looked at it for a couple 
more seconds them decided to leave...I felt somewhat mesmerized by it and ut seemed to increase in intensity when you focused on it...I felt whatever knew we were observing it
content.summary: Witnessed diamo d shaped object which would brighten then vanish motionless no noise then turned to face us slowly decend getting brighter and bigger

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving down the street, we all noticed what look like a huge box in the sky with so many really white lights,the lights seem to like keep going to the right to left, right to left and at the same time a light seen to be going down also... it was so big and bright, also silent this happen on 4-6-2012 at 9:10 pm i know we all not the only ones who saw this object in the sky.. ...
content.summary: Box shape ufo

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw the ufo my friend got a new smart phone and we were looking on google earth at the house and neighbor hood and he looked up at the sky and we saw the ufo if thats what it is. i will attach the picture that i found on google earth it is still the the same pic from 2007. i was looking at my house on 4-9-2012 and saw the ufo again. i wold like if some one could call me and i can tell you where to go on google earth so you can see it for your self in many different angles. 903-498-4385
content.summary: Found on google earth

content.detailedDescription: As i stated above myself as well as various others i have been with have witnessed orange orbs as well as dimly lit discs that seemed to spin, we could actuall see the windows, which were almost square. on one occasion, last june we witnessed a orange light hovering, it ommited a dull hum, amd dropped out what looked like hundreds of lightning bugs into a tree twenty feet from us. as i said there is without a doubt an alien presence what sems to be every time i go outside at night. i am beginning to think that they are attracted to me, am i crazy??
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: For the past week and a half myself, my 12 yr old son and his mother, on four different occasions witnessed amber colored orbs hovering in the sky. on two occasion we witnessed a brightly lit disc flying overhead at about five hundred feet.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside my apartment dorr and looked to the right.  i saw a very bright object moving slowly in the  sky from south to north. for a second i thought it was a planet or a star. then i noticed it moving slowly. thnen i thought it might be an airplane or a helicopter with landing lights. i thought it had to be, it was too bright.  then, i noticed there were no strobe lights of any kind.  i grabbed my binoculus and focused on it.  as i have said, it was a very bright light that discharged an itty-bitty small light from the stern and picked up the speed. it looked like the little light had its own power and accelerated away. it looked like a little white dot.  the main object started to pick up speed very fast, changed color to a dull orange glow and disappeared over the trees.  the whole thing lasted two minutes.
content.summary: Slow moving very bright light, discharged a smaller light and picked up the speed, changed color to dull orange glow
